toc.tocitem:
Functions Setup initcbInitialize CellBase mountcbMount CellBase
Databse functions switchcbSwitch CellBase data path and file name choosecbChoose between CellBases deletecbDelete CellBase renamecbRename CellBase relocatecbChange CellBase path findcbFind CellBase whichcbName of the active CellBase whoscbList of CellBases loadcbLoad the CellBase files checknmcbCheck whether a CellBase name is valid checkcbCheck main CellBase files upgradecbUpgrade CellBase to new version
Cell-level interface functions addcellAdd a cell to the database and perform all the analyses addnewcellsAdd new cells to CellBase delcellDelete cells from CellBase findcellLocate animals, sessions, or tetrodes in CellBase findcellposLocate animal, session or tetrode positions in CellBase findallcellsFind all clustered cells on the CellBase path listtagList CellBase tags listcellList all property values associated with a cell selectcellFind cells satisfying certain criteria tetrodepairsFind cells from the same tetrode in a session nontetrodepairsFind cells from different tetrodes in a session iscellidCheck if CellBase cell ID exists validcellidCheck if CellBase cell ID is valid loadcbLoad the CellBase files loadcellLoad spike and event times of a cell
Analysis-level interface functions addanalysisAdd an analysis to CellBase delanalysisDelete an analysis from CellBase runanalysisRun an analysis on CellBase findanalysisFind an analysis in CellBase findpropFind a property in CellBase insertdataInsert data into CellBase directly exportdataExport all data introduced to CellBase by the 'insertdata' function writedataWrite CellBase to Excel getvalueExtract all values associated with a property setvalueSet value associated with a property
Conversion functions cellid2fnamesConvert cell IDs to data file names cellid2tagsConvert cell IDs to separate tags cellid2valsConvert cell IDs to numbers fname2cellidConvert filenames to cell IDs
Helper functions findposFind trials with specific properties findcellstrSTRCMP for CellBase cell IDs unique_cellUnique list of cells unique_session_cellsSelect one cell per session cellcmpCompare two cell arrays nancell2structConvert cell of structures with NaNs to struct nancell2matConvert cell of equal size matrices with NaNs to double listdirList descending directories listfilesList files in a directory match_listFind exact matches of a string in a cell array of strings parse_argsParse input arguments nargvoutNumber of output arguments abs2reltimesCalculate relative time windows relative to events rel2abstimesCalculate absolute time windows relative to events restrict2Restrict vector to a range iprctilePercentile isbinaryDetermine whether an array is binary valuecrossingInterpolate value-crossings of a function nearestFind nearest point in vector linterp1D linear interpolation smoothSmooth with a moving average standardizeStandardization noblankRemove blanks sqSqueeze nan2zeroReplace NaNs with zeros zero2nanReplace zeros with NaNs formatforExcelHelper function for writing numbers to Excel files writefigsWrite figures to pdf createdocCreate documentation html file for functions
Data processing functions solo2trialevents4_auditory_gonogoCreate trial events structure solo2trialevents4_auditory_pavlovianCreate trial events structure MakeStimEvents2Create stimulus events structure MakeTrialEvents2_gonogoSynchronize trial events to recording times defineEventsEpochs_defaultDefine events and epochs for spike extraction defineEventsEpochs_gonogoDefine events and epochs for spike extraction defineEventsEpochs_pavlovianDefine events and epochs for spike extraction defineEventsEpochs_laserstimDefine events and epochs for spike extraction defineEventsEpochs_pulseonDefine events and epochs for spike extraction prealignSpikesAlign spikes to events and calculates rates for each epoch dynamicSpikeWindowRestrict spike times to event windows trialevents2relativetimeCalculate time values relative to reference event findSegs3Find segments of a session extractSegSpikesExtract spikes between specific timestamps extractEventSpikesExtract and align spikes in each trial relative to trial events extractEpochRatesCalculate spike rates in fixed or variable epochs extractSpikeWaveformsPeak-aligned waveforms parseValidTrialsTrial selection selecttrialExecute logical expression to filter trials filterTrialsFiltering trials partition_trialsSort all trials to partitions parseTTLsParse TTLs to channels parse_tokenParse arguments
Plot functions fstampPut a title below all subplots focusfigureBring figure and subplot into focus errorshadeShaded error bar plot defineLabelsColors_defaultLabels and colors for plotting makeColorsLabelsColors, labels and line style set_subplotsMake subplots with defined distances gcolorGet color string setmyfigureSet figure properties setmyplotSet axis properties maximize_figureMaximize figure window
Analysis functions quickanalysis2Analysis of tetrode data detect_burstsBurst detection reliability_latency_jitterReliability, latency and jitter of spiking efficiencyEfficiency of evoking spikes
Analysis functions - spike clusters check_channel_validityCheck tetrode channels LRatioL-ratio and Isolation Distance LRatio2L-ratio and Isolation Distance plot_mclust_projections2Plot feature data for clusters plotwaveformsPlot spontaneous and/or light-evoked spike shape
Analysis functions - raster and PSTH apsthSpike density function with adaptive Gaussian kernel dapsthSpike density function with 'doubly adaptive' Gaussian kernel stimes2binrasterCalculate binraster from spike times binraster2psthPSTH from binned spike raster binraster2apsthAdaptive PSTH from binned spike raster binraster2dapsth'Doubly adaptive' PSTH from binned spike raster smoothed_psthSmoothed PSTH plot_raster2aPlot spike raster plot_raster_psthPlot raster plots and PSTHs plot_timecoursePlot PSTH viewcell2bRaster plot and PSTH viewlickLick raster and PSTH rasterplotRaster plot (fast) ultimate_psthPeri-stimulus time histogram psth_statsStatistics for firing rate change
Analysis functions - optical tagging saltStimulus-Associated spike Latency Test findStimPeriodFind time period of stimulated spikes spikeshapecorrCorrelation of spontaneous and light-evoked spike shape lightclusterClustering of light-evoked spikes taggingCluster quality and tagging index taggedpropProperties of putative tagged neurons
Analysis functions - spike correlations acgAuto-correlations ccgCross-correlations
Analysis functions - anatomy reconstructionAnatomical reconstruction of electrode position
Analysis functions - behavior psych_gonogoAverage performance and reaction time psych_gonogo2Average performance and reaction time psych_gonogo_learningcurveAverage learning curve psychplot_gonogoPlot psychometric performance psychplot_pavlovianPlot performance
